jdbcService.sql: select gr.id, gr.created, gr.modified, gr.started, gr.stopped, gr.service, gr.inherit, gr.group_id, gr.role_id, gr.node_id from group_roles gr join groups g on gr.group_id = g.id join user_groups ug on ug.group_id = g.id where ug.user_id = :userId and ug.started is not null and ug.started < current_timestamp and (ug.stopped is null or ug.stopped > current_timestamp) and gr.started is not null and gr.started < current_timestamp and (gr.stopped is null or gr.stopped > current_timestamp)
